des: "This veggie soup is perfect for Halloween and serving as an appetizer for the Roast Beast!"
ins: Place broccoli, spinach, bell pepper, cucumber, and green peas in a blender or food processor. Process until smooth. Pour puree into a large pot. Stir in chicken broth and olive oil. Heat soup over medium-high heat. Stir in pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, sage, and ham. Bring soup to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Divide mozzarella cheese into 4 bowls. Pour the hot soup over the mozzarella cheese to serve.
